meanings.definition: A group of infectious diseases caused by bacteria of the genus Treponema.
meanings.sent1: Treponematoses can be transmitted through various means.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying different treatments for treponematoses.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria at the treponematoses party were quite infectious!
meanings.sent4: The spread of treponematoses in the community was like a silent invasion.
meanings.sent5: The impact of treponematoses on public health cannot be underestimated.

meanings.sent1: There were multiple cases of treponematoses reported in the clinic.
meanings.sent2: The doctor discussed the various treponematoses found in the region.
meanings.sent3: The treponematoses in the lab seemed to be having a party!
meanings.sent4: The treponematoses spread across the map like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The plural form of treponematosis is treponematoses.
